GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:users.description: serves a user object with the following properties: username, avatar_url, name

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the following properties: article_id, title, body, votes, topic, author, created_at and comment_count
